content: Antero Resources Corp  said it would sell its business that delivers fresh water to the shale industry to its master limited partnership Antero Midstream Partners LP  in a deal valued at $1.05 billion including debt.
name: Antero Midstream Partners LP
title: Antero Midstream to acquire water business for $1.05 billion

content: Sept 18 Antero Resources Corp said it would sell its business that delivers fresh water to the shale industry to its master limited partnership Antero Midstream Partners LP in a deal valued at $1.05 billion including debt.
name: Antero Midstream Partners LP
title: UPDATE 1-Antero Midstream to acquire water business for $1.05 bln

content: Sept 18 Antero Midstream Partners LP said it would buy Antero Resources Corp's business that delivers fresh water to shale drillers in a deal valued at $1.05 billion.
name: Antero Midstream Partners LP
title: Antero Midstream to acquire water business for $1.05 bln
